hackathon-description-text: Join us for our 1st annual Android Summit Hackathon!  Theme to be announced on Friday evening after the Summit.
hackathon-eligibility: Must sign up through EventBrite registration.  This hackathon is now full, we are no longer accepting registrations.
hackathon-requirements:
App descriptions are due in DevPost at 5pm.  These should include:
Check out the sample submission under the "Submissions" tab to get an idea what yours should look like!
Code lock is 6:00pm.  All projects are due in a public GitHub repo at this time.  Link to this repo should be included in the DevPost submission.
hackathon-rules:
View our 
.
Hacking must be completed entirely during the scheduled time (9:30am - 6:00pm).  Projects that are started prior to the start of the hackathon will be disqualified.
Team sizes must be between 3 and 5 people! 
Logistics

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The team that is awarded First Place will be the team that submits the application that receives the most votes during the judging period.
The team that is awarded Second Place will be the team that submits the application that receives the second most votes during the judging period.
The team that is awarded Third Place will be the team that submits the application that receives the third most votes during the judging period.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=1680 Capital One Tower Dr, Tysons, VA 22102, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Most innovative application as it relates to the hackathon theme as judged by fellow hackers.

hackathon-location-address: 1680 Capital One Tower Dr, Tysons, VA 22102, USA
